project_abstract.cdata: This Project Paper aims to provide an Additional Financing in an amount of SDR 7.0 million (US$lO million equivalent) to the Republic of Niger for the Water Sector Project (Cr. 3505-NIR). The Additional Financing will help finance the costs associated with: (1) rehabilitating water distribution systems in secondary towns, which could not be fully implemented under the current project due to an unanticipated financial gap; and (2) providing about 5,000 new private connections to the water distribution network, 70 public standpipes and 1,500 household latrines as a result of the strong additional demand from the population. No changes to the objectives or general design and implementation modalities of the project are being proposed. The Additional Financing will be used to address a financing gap under the current IDA-financed project and scale up the project's impact and development effectiveness.
